title: Cheesy potato and carrot soup
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons olive oil', '6 potatoes, cubed', '3 large carrots, peeled and diced', '1 pinch salt, to taste', '1 teaspoon garlic granules', '1 teaspoon onion powder', '900ml chicken stock', '85g mature Cheddar cheese, grated', '4 tablespoons chopped fresh flat-leaf parsley']
